entry.title: Americas (US East) Incident
entry.content:
Oct 20, 05:35 EDT
Identified - Genesys Cloud experienced a major incident due to the platform provider. Genesys Cloud services are in recovery at this time, but have not fully restored. Next update top of the hour.

entry.title: Analytics & Reporting Delays Americas (Sao Paulo)
entry.content:
Oct 16, 04:00 EDT
Resolved - Error rates have returned to normal, and the backlogged events have been successfully processed. Issue is now resolved.

Oct 16, 03:49 EDT
Monitoring - Mitigation steps were successful, with error rates continuing to decline. Next update: 04:00 AM ET, or earlier if new information becomes available.

Oct 16, 03:33 EDT
Investigating - Development teams are investigating an issue impacting real time analytics in Sao Paulo region. Customers may experience delays with user presence, aggregate metrics, observation metrics, and notifications. Mitigation steps have been implemented, and we are monitoring for improvement.

entry.title: X (Twitter) Social Listening Services Impaired
entry.content:
Oct 15, 18:19 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 15, 15:59 EDT
Update - Our vendor is still investigating the issue with their API v2 service. The next update will be provided by 18:00 Eastern, or sooner if new information becomes available.

Oct 15, 14:02 EDT
Update - Our vendor is still investigating the issue with their API v2 service. The next update will be provided by 16:00 Eastern, or sooner if new information becomes available.

Oct 15, 13:00 EDT
Update - Our vendor is still investigating the issue with their API v2 service. The next update will be provided by 14:00 Eastern, or sooner if new information becomes available.

Oct 15, 11:30 EDT
Update - Our vendor is continuing to investigate the issue in their API v2 offering, next update 13:00 Eastern or sooner as information becomes available.

Oct 15, 09:55 EDT
Update - Service teams continue to work with the vendor to restore service. Impact remains with Genesys Cloud Social Listening. Inbound and Outbound DMs are working as expected. Next update 11:30AM Eastern or sooner as information becomes available.

Oct 15, 08:56 EDT
Update - Genesys Cloud engineers remain engaged with the third-party vendor as the vendor continues to investigate root cause of the stream error within their platform.
Next update 10:00 Eastern or sooner as information becomes available.

Oct 15, 07:30 EDT
Update - It is confirmed the issue is isolated to the X stream functionality only. Genesys Cloud engineers remain engaged with the third-party vendor as the vendor continues to investigate root cause.
Next update 08:00 Eastern or sooner as information becomes available.

Oct 15, 06:59 EDT
Update - Genesys Cloud engineers remain engaged with the third-party vendor as the vendor continues to investigate root cause. Next update 08:00 Eastern or sooner as information becomes available.

Oct 15, 06:14 EDT
Identified - Genesys Cloud engineers remain engaged with the third-party vendor as the vendor continues to investigate root cause of the messaging issue within their platform. Next update 07:00 Eastern or sooner as information becomes available

entry.title: Genesys Cloud Maintenance - Mumbai
entry.content:
Oct 10, 17:30 EDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 10, 16:30 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 1, 13:53 EDT
Update - The scheduled maintenance that is planned for October 4, 02:00 AM local time, has been rescheduled for October 11, 02:00 am local time.

Sep 18, 09:51 EDT
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Sep 10, 10:12 EDT
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Sep 10, 10:11 EDT
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Sep 19, 16:30 EDT
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Sep 19, 16:30 EDT
Scheduled - On October 4, 02:00 AM local time, Genesys Cloud will be performing maintenance on the service responsible for managing and running outbound dialing campaigns. Maintenance is expected to take approximately sixty minutes, during which time, customers can expect intermittent timeouts, reconnects, and slowed or interrupted dialing.

entry.title: Genesys Cloud Maintenance - Ohio
entry.content:
Oct 10, 03:00 EDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 10, 02:00 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 1, 14:03 EDT
Scheduled - The scheduled maintenance planned for September 28, 02:00 AM local time, was not completed and has been rescheduled for October 10, 2:00 am local time.

Genesys Cloud will be performing maintenance on the service responsible for managing and running outbound dialing campaigns. Maintenance is expected to take approximately sixty minutes, during which time, customers can expect intermittent timeouts, reconnects, and slowed or interrupted dialing.
